row.name: Blowgun dart
row.comment: These thin, light darts are typically made of hardwood and stabilized with fletching of down or fur. They are often hollow so they can be used to deliver poison.

row.name: Bolt
row.comment: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

row.name: Sling bullet
row.comment: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

row.name: Arrow
row.comment: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.
